We just reached 900! Yay! So if you know and want to know more about Perl 6, check the tag https://t.co/2kzZhjhdnM from time to time and/or create an alert. You'll help. You will be helped. The community will grow. Happiness will ensue. https://t.co/LVeT5IcYSn

StackOverflow is an essential part of the community for any language or open source tool. Is where people get their question answered, and also where search engines find answers to questions. In the #perl6 community, we are shooting for the 1k question mark https://t.co/Z1Yh944Clr

The #perl6 tag has reached 900 questions in StackOverflow https://t.co/jsMTFgzdxb It's not a whole lot, it's not steadily growing, but at least most questions get answered in very little time thanks to @raiph_mellor, @jnthnwrthngtn and people like them https://t.co/QWLhtgrdBH
